author: Staff Reporter
text:
Twenty-four sovereigns of gold jewellery and 2.5 kg of silver articles were stolen in two different burglaries here.

In one of the two burglaries, the house of a junior assistant at Mathur BDO was broken into and 17 sovereigns of gold jewellery were stolen. According to the police, the owners of the house were out on training at the time of the burglary. The house was found broken into by neighbours on Sunday, who later informed the police. In the second incident, a locked house in Bargur was found burgled by its owners, when they returned home. According to the police, the owners of the house had left for Bengaluru at the time of the crime. About 7 sovereigns of gold jewellery and 2.5 kg of silver articles were stolen. Bargur police have registered a case.
title: Houses burgled
